pageProduct.name: Trilogy Vital Moisturising Cream 60ml
pageProduct.description:
Common Uses

Nourishes and hydrates complexions day/night with rosehip antioxidant complex Rosapene™, marula and orange flower.

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), Glycerin (Vegetable), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Wheat Straw Glycosides (and) Cetearyl Alcohol, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Seed Oil, Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Seed Oil (and) Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride (and) Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil (and) Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil (and) Tocopherol, Lycopene, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai) Fruit Oil (and) Tocopherol, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Sclerocarya Birrea (Marula) Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate (vitamin E), Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Chamomilla Recutita Matricaria (chamomile) Flower Extract, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Citric Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid (and) Benzyl Alcohol, Parfum, Citral, Geraniol, Citronellol, Limonene, Linalool, Dehydroacetic Acid (and) Benzyl Alcohol

Directions

Gently massage onto cleansed face, neck and décolletage morning and/or night.
